body.raw:
✏️ **`on the same page : 같은 의견 / 생각을 가지다.`**
CEO : Make sure you have a good understanding of our company's vision and missions.           We should be all `on the same page` before we pitch our ideas to the VCs. **내 의견에 동조하는지, 잘 이해했는지 확인할 때 "Are we on the same page?"**
